subject: Soccer
Strikes
lead_paragraph: The owners of Spanish soccer teams backtracked Friday on their threat to halt the country's top league, deciding instead to open negotiations with the government over a fiscal reform plan that would almost double the tax burden on foreign players.
snippet: The owners of Spanish soccer teams backtracked Friday on their threat to halt the country's top league, deciding instead to open negotiations with the government over a fiscal reform plan that would almost double the tax burden on foreign players.
